desc: PCI ID of the device vendor
Major, minor, and patch level of the renderer implementation
Boolean indicating whether or not the renderer is hardware accelerated
Number of megabytes of video memory available to the renderer
Boolean indicating whether or not the renderer uses a unified memory architecture or has separate "on-card" and GART memory.
Bitmask of the preferred context profile for this renderer. This value is suitable to be supplied with the GLX_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK_ARB attribute to glXCreateContextAttribsARB
Maximum core profile major and minor version supported by the renderer
Maximum compatibility profile major and minor version supported by the renderer
Maximum OpenGL ES 1.x major and minor version supported by the renderer
Maximum OpenGL ES 2.x or 3.x major and minor version supported by the renderer
